programme.title: Yasser Arafat's speech at the UN, 1988
programme.short_synopsis: A milestone in Middle Eastern politics as Yasser Arafat is invited to speak at the UN.
programme.medium_synopsis: Yasser Arafat's speech at the UN, the denial of his visa by US secretary of state George Schultz, and the view that Palestinians are moving towards reconciliation with Israel.
